mapper.select: select t20.prod_wearing_condition, t10.prod_name, to_char(t10.prod_wearing_price,'FM999,999,999') as prod_wearing_price, to_char(t10.prod_wearing_price * t20.prod_wearing_cnt,'FM999,999,999') as prod_wearing_price_calc, t20.prod_wearing_cnt, to_char(t30.prod_cnt,'FM999,999,999') as prod_root_cnt, t20.prod_wearing_company_id from product t10, product_wearing t20, product_root t30 where t20.prod_id = t10.prod_id(+) and t20.prod_id = t30.prod_id(+)
